actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide Federal Government guarantees of investments of State and local government pensions funds for construction of magnetic levitation transportation facilities, and for other purposes.
short_title: Mag-Lev Transportation Construction Loan Guarantee Pilot Program Act

summary.text: Mag-Lev Transportation Construction Loan Guarantee Pilot Program Act - Defines "mag-lev transportation construction project" to mean the construction of any facility (including vehicles) using magnetic levitation propulsion for the transportation of passengers and their baggage between metropolitan statistical areas. Requires 75 percent of the manufactured and unmanufactured materials included in such vehicles to be U.S. made. Establishes a Mag-Lev Transportation Construction Loan Guarantee Board. Authorizes the Board to guarantee loans made by a State or local government from government employee pension plan funds to a mag-lev transportation construction project. Sets forth certain terms, conditions, and requirements with respect to such loan guarantees. Establishes in the Treasury a Mag-Lev Transportation Construction Fund. Authorizes appropriations. Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to allow States, under specified conditions, to grant rights-of-way without charge to publicly or privately owned mass transit authorities for such projects. Authorizes the Corps of Engineers to provide engineering design services to State transportation departments on a reimbursable basis. Authorizes States to use interstate highway trust fund allocations for such design work. Establishes a grant program to establish one or more Mag-Lev Research and Development Centers at U.S. institutions of higher learning. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Mag-Lev Transportation Construction Loan Guarantee Pilot Program Act
A bill to provide Federal Government guarantees of investments of State and local government pensions funds for construction of magnetic levitation transportation facilities, and for other purposes.
